tool_description: NFTsmaker.io its first API to fetch all data displayed of NiftyGateway marketplace
name: NiftyGateway Data Scraper
title: NiftyGateway Data Scraper

api_list.name: List Artist
api_list.description: Of Api below you can fetch all artists registred of marketplace and visit there collections, and media links
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://niftygateway-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/artists"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "niftygateway-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://niftygateway-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/artists"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "niftygateway-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
